participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: motivated and disciplined with a passion for fitness and personal growth.
participant_1.background: i love running and preparing for marathons. i am a clean eater. i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. my parents were both very athletic.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: outspoken and socially conscious, with a keen interest in sustainability and online activism.
participant_2.background: i am a feminist. i buy only organic food products. i spend a lot of time browsing the internet. i have solar panels on my roof. i love social media especially twitter.
